typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ForecastedAtJourneyPatternSequenceNumber as string,
		OnboardCountForecasts as (JourneyPatternSequenceNumber as string, OnboardCount as string)[],
		OrganizationId as string,
		JourneyRef as (ObjectRef as string, OperatingDayDate as string),
		TimeStamps as string,
		partitionKey as string,
		LastModifiedDateTime as string,
		id as string,
		Type as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sourceJson
sourceJson select(mapColumn(
		ForecastedAtJourneyPatternSequenceNumber,
		OnboardCountForecasts,
		OrganizationId,
		TimeStamps,
		partitionKey,
		LastModifiedDateTime,
		id,
		Type,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts},
		{JourneyRef.ObjectRef} = JourneyRef.ObjectRef,
		{JourneyRef.OperatingDayDate} = JourneyRef.OperatingDayDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		ForecastedAtJourneyPatternSequenceNumber,
		OnboardCountForecasts,
		OrganizationId,
		TimeStamps,
		partitionKey,
		LastModifiedDateTime,
		id,
		Type,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts},
		JourneyRef_ObjectRef = {JourneyRef.ObjectRef},
		JourneyRef_OperatingDayDate = {JourneyRef.OperatingDayDate}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
